item.title: amatriciana
item.description: typical pasta dish of centre of italy, with guanciale (pillow), onions, tomato puree Â origin: amatrice, lazio, italia ingredients (4 people): guanciale (pillow) - 50gr is the result of the processing of the cheek of the pork, or gully or even a specific piece of the neck, tipical, from the region of center Italy, very famous that of Amatrice. onion - 1 piece is one of the two starting point of quite all the tipical italian pasta sauce.
